com.samskivert.depot

Class EHCacheAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.depot.EHCacheAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheAdapter

    public class EHCacheAdapter
extends Object
implements CacheAdapter
    An implementation of CacheAdapter for ehcache where each CacheAdapter.CacheCategory results in one Ehcache. All (cacheId, key) combinations within one category is stuffed into the same Ehcache, and all elements are cached under EHCacheKey, which basically wraps just such a tuple. Thus there are currently only four Ehcaches in play, called 'depotRecord', 'depotLongKeyset', 'depotShortKeyset' and 'depotResult'. These must be defined in your ehcache.xml configuration. If you use distributed replication/invalidation, you should replicate updates and removes but not puts nor updates-via-copy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EHCacheAdapter

        public EHCacheAdapter(net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager cachemgr,
                      String ident)
        Creates an adapter using the supplied cache manager with the default cache configurations. Note: this adapter does not shut down* the supplied manager when it is shutdown. The caller is responsible for shutting down the cache manager when it knows that Depot and any other clients no longer need it.

      • EHCacheAdapter

        public EHCacheAdapter(net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager cachemgr,
                      String ident,
                      EHCacheAdapter.EHCacheConfig recordConfig,
                      EHCacheAdapter.EHCacheConfig shortKeySetConfig,
                      EHCacheAdapter.EHCacheConfig longKeySetConfig,
                      EHCacheAdapter.EHCacheConfig resultConfig)
        Creates an adapter using the supplied cache manager with the specific cache configurations. Note: this adapter does not shut down* the supplied manager when it is shutdown. The caller is responsible for shutting down the cache manager when it knows that Depot and any other clients no longer need it.
